mapper.select: select e.type as type,es.number as number,pe.form as form,pe.status as status,ei.outtime as outtime,pe.time as time from equipment as e left join equipmentsublist as es on e.id = es.eid left join equipmentinoutstorage as ei on ei.number = es.number left join partnerequipment as pe on es.id = pe.eid where pe.pid = #{pid}
select form from partnerequipment where eid = (select id from equipmentsublist where number = #{equipmentnumber})
select pe.* from equipmentsublist as es left join partnerequipment as pe on pe.eid = es.id left join partner as p on p.id = pe.pid where es.number = #{number}
select smoney from partnerequipment where eid = #{eid}

select * from equipmentsublist as es left join partnerequipment as pe on es.id = pe.eid left join shop as s on s.pid = pe.pid left join administrator as a on a.sid = s.sid where a.wxid = #{wxid} and form = #{form}

select * from equipmentsublist as es left join partnerequipment as pe on es.id = pe.eid left join shop as s on s.pid = pe.pid left join partner as p on p.id = s.pid where p.wxid = #{wxid} and form = #{form}
mapper.update: update partnerequipment set name = #{name} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from partnerequipment pe left join partner p on pe.pid = p.id left join equipment e on pe.eid = e.id where p.wxid = #{wxid} and pe.smoney is not null
mapper.update: update partnerequipment set look = 1 where eid in( select p.eid from ( select pe.eid as eid from partnerequipment pe left join partner p on pe.pid = p.id where p.wxid = #{wxid} and pe.smoney is not null) as p )
mapper.select: select count(*) from partnerequipment pe left join partner p on pe.pid = p.id where p.wxid = #{wxid} and pe.smoney is not null and pe.look = 2
mapper.update: update partnerequipment set smoney = #{smoney} where eid = #{eid}
update partnerequipment set look = 2 where eid = #{eid}
